item.title: Two questions
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“docarter, post:16, topic:288933”]Thanks Rich, also do you know how I could make it where when people join the Jad mini game get’s completed?

item.title: Two questions
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Example;

public void multiAttackNPC(Player p, int gfx, int maxHit, int squares) { for (NPC n : Engine.npcs) { if (n == null || !p.distanceToPoint(n.npcX, n.npcY, p.playerX, p.playerY, squares) { continue; } n.setGfx(gfx); if (!n.npcDead) { n.hitDiff = Misc.random(maxHit); n.hitUpdate = true; if (n.attackingPlayer == -1) { n.attackingPlayer = p.playerId; } } } }

Read full topic

Do you mind putting “Alter the method attackPlayersWithin(int, int, int) for NPCs” in code form? I’m not really sure what you mean by that.

Read full topic

item.title: Two questions
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Alter the method attackPlayersWithin(int, int, int) for NPCs. Excluding your brackets, your command should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Two questions
item.dc:creator: @docarter docarter
item.description:
@docarter wrote:

Number one.

I have a code (below) added where I can use barrage to multi hit people, but what would I need to make it also multi hit NPC’s?

if (spell == 12891 && multiCombat()) { attackPlayersWithin(369, 30, 2); }

Also, can you create a quick command that works like this? I can’t figure out why mine won’t work.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("health")) { addSkillXP(14000000, 3);

Read full topic
